summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Casino Admin Panel new features: Game Management, Bonus Management, Support, and Player Details. All core functionalities are working correctly.

ui_bugs.issue: Badge component was not imported causing component crash

design_issues.issue: No support tickets are showing in the list
design_issues.note: This appears to be expected behavior as no tickets exist in the database

passed_tests: Backend API - Games Management (GET, POST, Toggle)
Frontend - Game Management page and Add Game functionality
Frontend - Bonus Management page (after Badge fix)
Frontend - Player Details page with all tabs (Profile, KYC, Game History, Logs)
